name: Splash Cars
description:
Tired of the everyday grey? Color the world in the ride of your life!


Team up with a friend or stranger and head on to change the world.

There are more ways to grab cars, car paint jobs, blueprints, power-ups, and coins, and extend your gas tank capacity. Plus Local multiplayer is awaiting you now!

Riding a splash car is exactly what you'd expect. Fun! Paint oozes from your machine leaving a colorful trail behind.

But not everybody likes fun. The cops are always watching and will chase you to the end of the world when they see you drive. They want to bust you for shaking up the colorless established order.

Don't let them! Be quick and break the chase. Now's your chance to fully express yourself through color and style.
There are over 18 Splash Cars with ways to unlock them faster via coins or blueprints, and they all come in three paint jobs. Stand out in the crowd and enjoy the new look. Each Splash Car now comes in three paint jobs. Stand out in the crowd and enjoy the new looks.

* Race for freedom of expression
* Choose your own style from a range of original splash paint cars
* Grow the racy art challenge in new and constantly growing neighborhoods
* Use power-ups to sabotage cops and supersize your car
* Convert public servants to aid you in your cause

You are special. Paint their world a brighter color, convince them to join you in your cause.
